sentences.sentence: His speech and manners became curiously ceremonious and courtly, to the vast admiration and amusement of his intimates.
sentences.translation: 他的言谈举止变得出奇地讲究而有宫廷气派，使他的密友们大为钦佩，也觉得有趣。

sentences.sentence: Yet to the horror of the tiny circle of intimates in whom he'd confided, Jobs was considering not having the surgery at all.
sentences.translation: 他把这消息透露给了他几个亲密的朋友，然而让他们感到极度不安的是，乔布斯并不打算接受手术。

sentences.sentence: But no experts associated with the study or who have read the results believe that this finding intimates that stretching had been keeping them uninjured in the past.
sentences.translation: 不过，和该研究相关的或者是看过研究结果的专家们，并不认为该现象就能说明之前拉伸的习惯是一直防止他们受伤的原因。
